description:
Vasilis is kind of an adorable young latin dude that I thought just looked like he had a sweet disposition, which turned out to be very true.
He is a little shy once you get to know him, but for his young age, he can certainly carry his own in conversation- once you get him talking!
Vasilis is a straight guy who did agree with me that the girls go crazy over his bubble butt. He wondered if gay guys would be into it as well. Would they?!?!
I think the biggest behind scene moment is the fact that Vasilis wears glasses. Now I am sure somewhere out there, there are guys who dig dudes in glasses, but for filming, they are just too reflective.
So the poor kid was doing a lot of squinting and we did have to stop several times to put his glasses on so he could stay charged up. You'll notice them moving about the bedroom as they magically shift places.
This "issue" was fixed and made for an interesting "end of the bed" cumshot where I rolled the porn cart right up to him- practically to his knees.
The extra effort was worth it. Vasilis I think shot one giant load at once, spraying his neck and chest. There didn't seem to be a lot of other spurts, it's like it all came out at once.
Tou can tell that that one spasm wore him out!
title: Vasilis - Solo
